snippet.desc:
Not required. Simply displays the scene / stage number in which you selected.

Pressing R will get back to the selection screen.
snippet.description:
Not required. Simply displays the scene / stage number in which you selected.

Pressing R will get back to the selection screen.
snippet.name: Stage Display

snippet.desc: Simply switches the scene to the stage number that was clicked on using the mouse.
snippet.description: Simply switches the scene to the stage number that was clicked on using the mouse.
snippet.name: Switch to Selected Stage
